name: BOX (itch) (Leaky Jarrrr)
description: BOX We're all small dust floating in the universe, but are trapped in BOX working on screen.  Not only our body is trapped, but also our mind. We're all hard workers, but the more we work, the more we lost.      "Why do we stare at screens all the time?"      "Are we becoming the slave of money?"      "Where will technology lead us to?" Music: Alvin Lucier I Am Sitting in a Room (1969) Use arrow keys to control movement, mouse to control view, and shift to run  (press Q to quit game)
